function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Virus transmission via touching interactions with surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Simulation of specific scenarios within confined spaces to evaluate transmission risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex human behaviors with temporal dynamics","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease propagation through human-building interactions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stochastic modelling paradigms for simulating occupant behavior","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The focus on virus transmission and its impact on architectural design and facility planning","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simulating the locations or moving trajectories of people in architectural-scale designs","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporating agency into virtual humans to evaluate design with multi-occupant scenarios","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on already constructed and occupied environments for research","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of virus transmission within the context of covid-19 due to the design of the occupancy simulation system.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential lack of consideration for other human factors in space analysis tools, such as spatial ergonomics, productivity, and social and physical comfort.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dynamic human-building interactions influencing virus transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential asynchronous transmission of the virus by a single individual contaminating a shared environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ability to analyze decisions within the context of relevant human-building interactions and their relationships to potential virus spread.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus transmission via surfaces and air circulation within the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for social and physical interactions among occupants and the built environment","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased number of tweets about neighbour noise due to lockdown","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in perceived outdoor noise level and increase in perceived neighbour noise level during the lockdown","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data collection from a specific location, period, and language may not represent a comprehensive picture of noise complaints and sources.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Manual identification of noise sources from social media data limits the scalability and accuracy of the analysis.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of objective data on noise measurement and sound insulation of buildings hinders accurate assessment of indoor noise sources.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in outdoor noise levels due to travel restrictions during lockdown","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive and natural sound sources becoming disturbing during reduced outdoor noise levels","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in annoyance ratings of neighbor noise during lockdown","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistency in noise annoyance research results","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in neighbour and outdoor noise patterns during lockdown","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased neighbour noise during lockdown due to more people staying and working from home.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased neighbour noise complaints during lockdown","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Substantial increase in time spent on entertainment during lockdown","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consistent high annoyance ratings during lockdown suggest underlying factors contributing to dissatisfaction with noise levels.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in transportation noise during lockdown does not significantly impact annoyance levels from outdoor noise sources.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased negative perception of bird songs in urban areas due to reduced ambient noise levels during lockdown","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Construction noise becoming more dominant in the urban environment during lockdown","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in attitudes towards outdoor noise levels during lockdown","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased annoyance ratings for neighbour noise sources","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in outdoor noise levels due to lockdown measures","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in outdoor noise complaints risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Statistical differences in annoyance ratings for different noise sources","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased percentage of
